Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan.name: Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan

unit.name: Auto-Tapestry of the Emperor’s Judgement
unit.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Aestred Thurga model, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability Recount the Deeds of the Saints: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Agathae Dolan model, each time that unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice . When that Agathae Dolan model is destroyed , you gain D3 Miracle dice.

Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Battle Sisters Squad Celestian Insidiants Celestian Sacresants Dominion Squad Retributor Squad Sisters Novitiate Squad Crusaders

Canoness.name: Canoness

ranged.name: Brazier of holy fire ignores cover one shot torrent

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Sacred Command
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP. The Emperor’s Grace: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Null Rod
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks .

unit.name: Rod of Office
unit.description: Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

Canoness.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Battle Sisters Squad Celestian Insidiants Celestian Sacresants Dominion Squad Retributor Squad Sisters Novitiate Squad Crusaders

Canoness with Jump Pack.name: Canoness with Jump Pack

ranged.name: Ministorum hand flamer ignores cover pistol torrent

unit.name: Sacred Command
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP. Divine Deliverance: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Daemonifuge.name: Daemonifuge

unit.name: Holy Judgement
unit.description: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this unit's Ephrael Stern model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 2 from the result if it is a CHAOS unit. If the test is failed, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds . Mysterious Saviours: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

default_wargear: 1 Ephrael Stern – EPIC HERO 1 Kyganil of the Bloody Tears – EPIC HERO Ephrael Stern is equipped with: bolt pistol; Sanctity. Kyganil of the Bloody Tears is equipped with: the Outcast’s Weapons.

Dialogus.name: Dialogus

unit.name: Laud Hailer
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked. Stirring Rhetoric: While this model is leading a unit, each time this model’s unit performs an Act of Faith , the value of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first changed to a 6.

Dialogus.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Battle Sisters Squad Celestian Insidiants Celestian Sacresants Dominion Squad Retributor Squad Sisters Novitiate Squad Crusaders This model can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD , even if one CANONESS , PALATINE , JUNITH ERUITA or AESTRED THURGA model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths .

Hospitaller.name: Hospitaller

unit.name: Medicus Ministorum
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Sacred Healing: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase , you can return up to 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit. If you wish, you can first discard 1 Miracle dice ; if you do, you can return up to D3+1 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit instead.

unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll . Fiery Conviction: If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your Command phase , you can choose one of the following: Discard 1 Miracle dice and gain 1CP. Take a Leadership test for this model, if that test is passed, gain 1CP.

unit.name: Righteous Smiting
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll . Zealot: Once per battle, in the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by this model by 3.

Morvenn Vahl.name: Morvenn Vahl

unit.name: Abbess Sanctorum
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll . Righteous Repugnance: Each time this model’s unit is selected to shoot or fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice . If you do, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of Fidelis and the Lance of Illumination. Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by this model, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

unit.name: Fury of the Righteous
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. Rapturous Blows: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice . If you do, then until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack made by this model scores a wound, the target of that attack suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.

Saint Celestine.name: Saint Celestine

ranged.name: The Ardent Blade ignores cover torrent

unit.name: Healing Tears
unit.description: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase , if this unit is below its Starting Strength , either one destroyed Geminae Superia model or up to D3 other Bodyguard models are returned to this unit. Lifewards: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability. Miraculous Intervention: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed , roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

Saint Celestine.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Seraphim Squad Zephyrim Squad
led_by: Seraphim Squad Zephyrim Squad
default_wargear: 1 Celestine – EPIC HERO 2 Geminae Superia Saint Celestine is equipped with: the Ardent Blade. Each Geminae Superia is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.

Triumph Of Saint Katherine.name: Triumph Of Saint Katherine

unit.name: The Fiery Heart (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, add 2" to that unit's Move characteristic and add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

unit.name: Censer of the Sacred Rose (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock tests taken for that unit.

unit.name: Simulacrum of the Ebon Chalice (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of only one.

unit.name: Simulacrum of the Argent Shroud (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

unit.name: Icon of the Valorous Heart (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

unit.name: Petals of the Bloody Rose (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.

unit.name: Relics of the Matriarchs
unit.description: At the start of the battle round , select up to two of the abilities in the Relics of the Matriarchs section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has those abilities. Solemn Procession: Each time you gain 1 Miracle dice at the start of the battle round , if this model is on the battlefield, do not roll one D6 to determine the value of that Miracle dice; it has a value of 6.

If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability. Daemonbreaker: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a DAEMON unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .

Ministorum hand flamer IGNORES COVER PISTOL TORRENT

unit.name: Cherub
unit.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith , you gain 1 Miracle dice . Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used. Defenders of the Faith: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan Canoness Dialogus Dogmata Hospitaller Imagifier Junith Eruita Ministorum Priest Palatine Triumph Of Saint Katherine Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus

Immolator.name: Immolator

ranged.name: Twin heavy bolter sustained hits 2 twin-linked

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Purge and Cleanse
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover .

default_wargear: 1 Immolator This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; immolation flamers; armoured tracks.
Immolator.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 6 ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models or the TRIUMPH OF SAINT KATHERINE . At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, you can select one BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD , DOMINION SQUAD or SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD from your army. If you do, that unit is split into two units, each containing as equal a number of models as possible (when splitting a unit in this way, make a note of which models form each of the two new units. If you are splitting a unit that has the Cherub ability, only one of the new units can use that ability during the battle – make a note of which of the new units this will be). One of these units must start the battle embarked within this TRANSPORT ; the other can start the battle embarked within another TRANSPORT , or it can be deployed as a separate unit.

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Self Repair
unit.description: At the start of your Command phase , this model regains 1 lost wound.

default_wargear: 1 Sororitas Rhino This model is equipped with: storm bolter; armoured tracks.
Sororitas Rhino.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models or the TRIUMPH OF SAINT KATHERINE .

Repressor.name: Repressor

ranged.name: Repressor twin heavy flamer ignores cover torrent twin-linked

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Emergency Combat Embarkation
unit.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Charge phase , after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move , you can select one ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge. Provided that unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and every model in that unit is within 3" of this TRANSPORT , it can embark within this TRANSPORT .

default_wargear: 1 Repressor This model is equipped with: Repressor twin heavy flamer; storm bolter; dozer ram.
Repressor.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models or the TRIUMPH OF SAINT KATHERINE .

Battle Sanctum.name: Battle Sanctum

unit.name: FORTIFICATION
unit.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol , subtract 1 from the Hit roll . Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle- shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

unit.name: Consecrated Ground
unit.description: When this FORTIFICATION is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1" of another part. Friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models can be set up or end any type of move on top of the floor sections of this FORTIFICATION . While an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army is within 1" of this FORTIFICATION , that unit can perform one additional Act of Faith per phase. Holy Cover: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

default_wargear: 1 Battle Sanctum This model is equipped with: nothing.

unit.name: Extremis Trigger Word

unit.name: Cherubs
unit.description: Twice per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith , you gain 1 Miracle dice . Designer’s Note: Place two Cherub tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used. Storm of Retribution: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If such an attack targets an enemy unit that has destroyed one or more ADEPTA SORORITAS units from your army during the battle, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

Cherub: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith , you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

unit.name: Salvationist Medikit
unit.description: In your Command phase , if the bearer is on the battlefield, you can return up to D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to this unit.

unit.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following unit
unit.description: Ministorum Priest

Sanctifiers.leader_info: If a MINISTORUM PRIEST from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD , it can be attached to this unit instead. If a MINISTORUM PRIEST from your army is attached to this unit during the Declare Battle Formations step, that model gains the Scouts 6" ability.
default_wargear: 1 Miraculist 1 Salvationist 1 Death Cult Assassin 2 Missionaries 4 Sanctifiers The Miraculist is equipped with: holy fire; burning hands. The Salvationist is equipped with: close combat weapon; Salvationist medikit. The Death Cult Assassin is equipped with: Death Cult blades. 1 Missionary is equipped with: plasma gun; Sanctifier melee weapon. 1 Missionary is equipped with: Ministorum flamer; Sanctifier melee weapon. Every Sanctifier is equipped with: Ministorum hand flamer; Sanctifier melee weapon.
